summary: A look at the history and traditions of flamenco music and dance through the live performance of a wide variety of pieces.
cast: Sara Baras|José Miguel Carmona|Montse Cortés|Paco de Lucía|Farruquito|Israel Galván|José Mercé|Estrella Morente|Soleá Morente|Niña Pastori|Miguel Poveda|Manolo Sanlúcar|Tomatito|Eva Yerbabuena|Antonio Zúñiga
title: Flamenco, Flamenco
